IX.iii.1.A.5.e
.
Determining the Payment Period Commencement After an Election
When an election of current-law pension from Section 306 Pension or Old-Law Pension results in an increased rate, the new rate commences as of the first of the month following the date of the election.
Elections between disability compensation and pension (including assumed elections) are subject to
38 CFR 3.31
, but
38 CFR 3.31
does
not
apply if an assumed election results solely from a legislative change, such as when a cost-of-living adjustment (COLA) under
38 CFR 3.27
makes an election of the other benefit advantageous.
